content: Where is that value specified? I have it in the ImplementationGuide resource, and there doesn't seem to be a spot for it in package-list.json. Is it driven by category in package-list?
Comes from the contact in the IG

Aha, no index.cfm, and no trainling / - now it works!

Thanks!
Vassil Peytchev has marked this topic as resolved.
